back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -3 (-5 instead if your location is exxhausted).
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, either deal 1 damage to a [[Cultist]] enemy or remove 1 doom from a [[Cultist]] enemy.
[tablet]: -4. If you succeed, either draw 2 cards or gain 2 resources.
[elder_thing]: -5. If you succeed, ready your location or exhaust a [[Deep One]] enemy.
name: Consternation on the Constellation
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if your location is exxhausted).
[cultist]: -2. If you succeed, either deal 1 damage to a [[Cultist]] enemy or remove 1 doom from a [[Cultist]] enemy.
[tablet]: -3. If you succeed, either draw 2 cards or gain 2 resources.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you succeed, ready your location or exhaust a [[Deep One]] enemy.

name: Inspector Legrasse
text:
You have 1 additional accessory and 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold [[Relic]] assets.
[reaction] After a [[Cultist]] enemy at your location is defeated, exhaust Inspector Legrasse: Discover 1 clue at your location or gain 2 resources.
